info.title: ABTS Unified Generator
info.description: Agent-Based Text System for generating questions from outlines

get.description:
Get questions with advanced filtering and pagination

- **domain**: Filter by knowledge domain
- **complexity**: Filter by question complexity (e.g., easy, medium, hard)
- **question_type**: Filter by question type (e.g., multiple-choice, short-answer)
- **outline_id**: Filter by the outline ID that generated the questions
- **keywords**: Filter by keywords in question content
- **skip**: Number of records to skip for pagination
- **limit**: Maximum number of records to return

post.description: Create a new question with options

get.description: Get a specific question by ID

post.description:
Generate questions based on input data using the agent pipeline

This endpoint uses the configured agent pipeline to generate questions
from an outline or specific input text.

Process a batch of question operations

This endpoint allows for batch creation, updating, or deletion of questions.
For large batches, processing happens in the background and a job ID is returned.

get.description: Get the status of a batch processing job
Get statistics about the questions in the database

schema.title: Response Get Question Stats Api Questions Stats Get

post.description:
Generate questions without saving to database (preview mode)

Args:
    request: Question generation input
    
Returns:
    Generated questions result

get.description:
Test endpoint for checking the JSON parsing in the final formatter

This is a debugging endpoint to help diagnose issues with JSON parsing
in the final formatter agent.

schema.title: Response Test Parser Api Questions Test Parser Get

get.description:

Args:

Args:

    node_id: Node ID
    template_id: Optional template ID to use
    
Returns:

get.description:
Get the current state for an agent

Args:
    agent_id: Agent ID
    
Returns:
    Agent state

Get state by ID

Args:
    state_id: State ID
    
Returns:
    Agent state

patch.description:
Update an agent state

Args:
    state_id: State ID
    update_data: Data to update
    
Returns:
    Updated agent state

get.description:
Get all states for a pipeline

Args:
    pipeline_id: Pipeline ID
    
Returns:
    List of agent states

Get checkpoints for a state

Args:
    state_id: State ID
    
Returns:
    List of checkpoints

post.description:
Rollback a state to a checkpoint

Args:
    state_id: State ID
    checkpoint_id: Checkpoint ID to rollback to
    
Returns:
    Updated agent state

get.description: Get list of available agent types for pipelines

schema.title: Response Get Available Agent Types Api Pipeline Agent Types Get

post.description:
Execute an agent pipeline

Executes a sequence of agents where the output of each agent is passed as
input to the next agent.

get.description: Get list of available agent types

schema.title: Response Get Agent Types Api Agents Types Get

post.description:
Execute an agent with the given request

Creates an agent of the specified type and executes it with the given request.
